title: O&O SafeErase Professional Edition 8.10 + Serial
description:
Your personal photos and confidential documents can easily fall into the wrong hands when you sell, give away or dispose of your old PC or hard drives. Identity theft is now a widespread security threat. This is because clicking on â€œDeleteâ€ does not mean your files are permanently deleted. Even formatting the hard disk is not enough to permanently delete data. O&O SafeErase permanently deletes your confidential files using recognized methods so that a recovery is never possible, not even when using the best file recovery software.


O&O SafeErase Professional Edition 8.10 Build 216 is a trusted software application built specifically for helping users delete date securely from their computer, so it cannot be recovered using specialized tools.


It sports a clean and straightforward layout that allows you to scan the computer for files that contain sensitive or personal information.


The scanning operation is carried out very quickly and at the end of the task you are offered details about the items that were removed from the computer using normal deletion operations on each of your drives, as well as cookies.


Additionally, you can print or save the report to HTML file format, clean all files with just one simple click and tweak the scanning parameters in items of stored internet files (favorite URL's, bookmarks, passwords and form fills). Windows temporary items, as well as unsafe deleted files.


The program enables you to delete files directly from the primary panel or via the context menu, erase files and folders, partitions or an entire hard disk, delete the free space or clean the entire computer.


It offers for batch processing, which means you can add multiple items and process them at the same time.


O&O SafeErase Professional features six deletion algorithms, which ensures your personal information is overwritten with zeroes or random data and let's you wipe out internet files such as cookies, bookmarks, temporary files, index.dat, history, form data and passwords, cache and cookies stored by IE, Firefox and Chrome.


What's more, you can wipe out Windows files and iterms left by other utilities, namely temporary files, image preview cache, Kerner dump items, FTP data, cookies stored by Adobe Flash Player and others.


All in all, O&O SafeErase Professional proves to be a reliable application that offers a complete suite of tools for helping you delete data securely from your computer. The intuitive interface makes it an ideal tool for beginners and professionals alike.


Product featues:

- "Instant Erase": selecting files over the context menu prompts a mini-dialog from where deletion can immediately take place

- Permanent deletetion of files, folders, memory cards and USB sticks

- Delete an entire computer, no boot medium necessary

- Delete internet traces and temporary program files

- Six methods to permanently delete confidential data

- Detailed reports as proof of deletion

- Analysis tool to search for unsafe deleted files

- Adaptyed deletion method for SSDs (TRIM)

- Enhanced report and activity management

- Fully support Windows 10, Windows 8.1, Windows 7, Windows Vista and Windows XP
